bibl.title: Some Unpublished Greek Mummy Labels at the British Museum.
bibl.note: a) Mummy labels acquired by Rev. Greville John Chester in Akhmim in 1889: 1. T. Lond. Inv. EA 23187. - b) Mummy labels acquired by Rev. Chauncey Murch in Egypt in 1891: 2. Inv. EA 24433; - 3. Inv. EA 24442; - 4. Inv. EA 24447; - 5. Inv. EA 24551; - 6. Inv. EA 24454; - 7. Inv. EA 24455; - 8. Inv. EA 24467; - 9. Inv. EA 24472; - 10. Inv. EA 24479; - 11. Inv. EA 24487; - 12. Inv. EA 24498; - 13. Inv. EA 24500; - 14. Inv. EA 24508; - 15. Inv. EA 24534; - 16. Inv. EA 24537; - 17. Inv. EA 24539; - 18. Inv. EA 24545. - c) Labels donated by W. Merton: 19. Inv. EA 64351. - d) Acquisition unknown: 20. Inv. EA 69515; - 21. Inv. EA 69516.
bibl.seg: Raquel Martín Hernández & Sofía Torallas Tovar, Some Unpublished Greek Mummy Labels at the British Museum.
